import userEvent from "@testing-library/user-event"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "antd/dist/antd.css"; import { Alert } from "antd"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import useAuth from "../../hooks/useAuth"; import "./SendQuestion.css"; const SendQuestion = () => { const { register, reset, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data, "form"); setMessage(""); axios .post("https://darulmuttaquine-server.vercel.app/questions", data) .then((res) => { if (res.data.insertedId) { setMessage("Your question submitted SuccessFully!"); reset(); window.location.replace("/dashboard/myquestions"); } }); }; const { user } = useAuth(); return (
{/*
Send Your Question With Valid Information!
{message ? (
) : (
)} */} {
